00010

00012 public:
00013 
00023     virtual std::string getIntroFormat()        = 0;

00031     virtual std::string getFinalFormat()        = 0;
00032 
00033 
00043     virtual std::string getFatalFormat(std::string , int, std::string, std::string )    = 0;
00044

00055

00065     
00074     virtual std::string getInfoFormat(std::string str, int lineNo, std::string functionName, std::string fileName )     = 0;
00075     
00084     virtual std::string getDebugFormat(std::string str, int lineNo, std::string functionName, std::string fileName )    = 0;
